Introduction

C-CLOWN, short for ‘Crown Clown’, was a 6-member South Korean boy group under Yedang Entertainment (now known as Banana Culture). The group consisted of Rome, Siwoo, Ray, Kangjun, T.K, and Maru. C-CLOWN officially debuted on July 19, 2012. On October 5, 2015, it was announced that C-CLOWN disbanded.
